Notes: can also be the original Pico if you're on a budget and need to save 1 dollar
if they are longer than the ones in the design then they won't fit
i have a Pinecil, but any soldering iron with a small tip will work
i use 0.8mm solder for projects like this
i used 22 AWG wire, but anything of similar size works; solid or stranded
pack of 4 that i found on aliexpress
supposedly a 10 pack again on aliexpress
can be any type you wish to use, PLA/PETG would be best however
